ygData.subject: Re: Leap of Faith
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: No, Orion isn t stupid, he s just young. As for your posts Jer, i think they are EXCELLENT! But if it s constructive criticism you want, then you will get

OOC: No, Orion isn't stupid, he's just young. As for your posts Jer, i think 
they are EXCELLENT! But if it's constructive criticism you want, then you 
will get it: The Dinobots seem to talk more intelligently. Was that an 
accident, or have gotten smarter over the centuries?

:::Torca/Orion:::

::Torca curses as he sees that his nailgun isn't very effective.  he switches 
his gun to  plasma blaster.  he fires 2 blasts of plasma at Astroblast::
~~~~~
::He moves out of the way just in time.  he fires 4 shots at Rippersnapper::

--part1_fb.13f4eb35.283510f2_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
